qas.question: How do Asian countries feel about the European attitude towards Burma ?

answers.text: Asian corporations have generally remained willing to continue investing in the country and to initiate new investments

qas.question: What is a popular business for international Asian countries in Burma ?
What two countries does Burma have Superior relationships with ?
What is the benefit to the two countries involved in the  India Look East policy ?

answers.text: fields of co-operation between India and Myanmar include remote sensing, oil and gas exploration, information technology, hydro power and construction

context: Despite Western isolation, <a0_0>Asian corporations have generally remained willing to continue investing in the country and to initiate new investments<a0_0/>, particularly in <a1_0>natural resource extraction.<a1_0/> The country has close relations with neighbouring <a2_0>India and China<a2_0/> with several Indian and Chinese companies operating in the country. Under India's Look East policy, <a3_0>fields of co-operation between India and Myanmar include remote sensing, oil and gas exploration, information technology, hydro power and construction<a3_0/> of ports and buildings.
